name: Puzzle Battle RPG - Epic Quest
description:
Start playing today the best match 3 puzzle adventure game!

Puzzle Fantasy is an epic match 3 puzzle battle game with amazing heroes to collect. Discover a magic world full of ancient gods, old myths, and dangerous enemies. Gather a team of powerful heroes, and defeat the gods.

MATCH 3 ADVENTURE
Fight your enemies using the power of the ancient gems in match 3 battles. Combine the gems to chain strong attacks against your opponent.

Develop your strategy using the element of the gems, and the affinity of the heroes with the four elements.

COLLECT AND UPGRADE MIGHTY HEROES
Find unique heroes in your journey, and let them join your team. Gather heroes from different regions. Each one will be linked to one of the four elements: fire, water, earth, and air.

The elements are connected to the gems, and combining wisely the heroes with their elements will be the key to success.

DISCOVER A DEEP STORY
The world of Puzzle Fantasy is a world of ancient gods, and old legends. Follow the story mode to know more about the two goddesses who were betrayed before the world was born.

MAIN FEATURES
- Match 3 game with RPG elements
- Amazing heroes to collect with unique skills
- Easy to play puzzle game
- Challenges for all players
- An epic adventure about ancient gods, and myths

Puzzle Fantasy combines the addictive gameplay from match 3 games, with RPG elements. Collect heroes, upgrade them, and create a powerful team. If you like puzzle games, you will enjoy Puzzle Fantasy, and the easy to play match 3 gameplay.
